review: I am very unhappy with this stick. I have it for about 2 months and it every time they make an update of software or something else happens to it (I am not changing anything home), I need to reload Netfilx or  reset everything from the scratch (email, passwords, applications, etc.). It happened so far 4 times already. Yesterday, it just refused to show any movies at all in my Amazon library and Netflix due to some problem with HDCP protocol??? The technical support was unable to resolve the issue immediately (after doing a lot of things via the phone), so I am waiting now o hear from them after the weekend. I would avoid it by all means if I knew about it in advance, and I would return it back if I could.
author: Alex K. "Alec"
